scripts.build:theme: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/travelunbound && rsync -av --exclude=node_modules --exclude=.gitignore --exclude=README.md --exclude=assets/css/tailwind.css --exclude=src --exclude=.git --exclude=package.json --exclude=package-lock.json --exclude=tailwind.config.js ./ dist/travelunbound/ && npm run build:css
scripts.build: npm run build:theme && npm run build:zip
